author: m.kalinin
content:
It is possible but relies on synchronous communication between consensus and execution. One of design considerations for the merge is to be forward compatible and allow for making this communication async if we will want to move execution to a shard at some point in the future.

The other inconvenience with this is that this scheme goes around EVM and doesn't allow for the smart contract logic executed during claiming withdrawn funds which could be useful for staking pools.
